==Check Query Execution Time==

{{{
# Executes the target query, raising a critical alarm if it takes > 1 second to execute
check_mysql mysql_query 
    --args='query=SELECT COUNT(*) FROM test.t1' 
    --args='query_timeout=1'
}}}
